description: Request an origination phone number for use in your account. For more information on phone number request see Request a phone number in the AWS End User Messaging SMS User Guide.

parameters.name: IsoCountryCode
parameters.description: The two-character code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format, for the country or region.

parameters.name: MessageType
parameters.description: The type of message. Valid values are TRANSACTIONAL for messages that are critical or time-sensitive and PROMOTIONAL for messages that aren't critical or time-sensitive.

parameters.name: NumberCapabilities
parameters.description: Indicates if the phone number will be used for text messages, voice messages, or both. (string) ---

parameters.name: NumberType
parameters.description: The type of phone number to request. When you request a SIMULATOR phone number, you must set MessageType as TRANSACTIONAL.

parameters.name: OptOutListName
parameters.description: The name of the OptOutList to associate with the phone number. You can use the OptOutListName or OptOutListArn.

parameters.name: PoolId
parameters.description: The pool to associated with the phone number. You can use the PoolId or PoolArn.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) associate with the requested phone number. (dict) --- The list of tags to be added to the specified topic. The key identifier, or name, of the tag. The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you don't specify a client token, a randomly generated token is used for the request to ensure idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumberArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the requested phone number.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumberId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the new phone number.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The new phone number that was requested.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the request.

nested_items.name: IsoCountryCode
nested_items.description: The two-character code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format, for the country or region.

nested_items.name: MessageType
nested_items.description: The type of message. Valid values are TRANSACTIONAL for messages that are critical or time-sensitive and PROMOTIONAL for messages that aren't critical or time-sensitive.

nested_items.name: NumberCapabilities
nested_items.description: Indicates if the phone number will be used for text messages, voice messages or both.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NumberType
nested_items.description: The type of number that was released.

nested_items.name: MonthlyLeasingPrice
nested_items.description: The monthly price, in US dollars, to lease the phone number.

nested_items.name: TwoWayEnabled
nested_items.description: By default this is set to false. When set to true you can receive incoming text messages from your end recipients.

nested_items.name: TwoWayChannelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN used to identify the two way channel.

nested_items.name: TwoWayChannelRole
nested_items.description: An optional IAM Role Arn for a service to assume, to be able to post inbound SMS messages.

nested_items.name: SelfManagedOptOutsEnabled
nested_items.description: By default this is set to false. When an end recipient sends a message that begins with HELP or STOP to one of your dedicated numbers, AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice automatically replies with a customizable message and adds the end recipient to the OptOutList. When set to true you're responsible for responding to HELP and STOP requests. You're also responsible for tracking and honoring opt-out requests.

nested_items.name: OptOutListName
nested_items.description: The name of the OptOutList that is associated with the requested phone number.

nested_items.name: DeletionProtectionEnabled
nested_items.description: By default this is set to false. When set to true the phone number can't be deleted.

nested_items.name: PoolId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the pool associated with the phone number.

nested_items.name: RegistrationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the registration.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array of key and value pair tags that are associated with the phone number.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the phone number was created, in UNIX epoch time format.
